none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on February 01, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Oh, I'm sorry. You been living under a fukkn rock for the last four years or so? it's cool. It happens. Maybe you have a job? Maybe you have a family? Maybe you're an adult and you think that punk died in 1986 os some nonsense? Well...I was late to the game too, so you aren't alone. PERSONAL DAMAGE is the perfect collision of '80s LA punk and 2020s US hardcore punk. Listening to "Shut Your Mouth (Close Your Mind)" is like feeling sixteen years old...and that's erasing a lot of years and a lot of trauma for an old ass has been like be, so I am fukkn here for it.AMBUSH

seo.title: Personal Damage - Ambush - Terminal Escape
